TopicTitle: Need a plugin for my new mod.

Articles.Content: I need a plugin that places a craft on the surface and then makes the KSC disappear so it doesnt get in the way. This would make for an awesome survival game because you have only one starting ship with some crew and you have to use mods like Extraplanetary-Launchpads and CivPop to survive and generate a space program. Basically the game would entirely bypass the KSC scene and go straight into the starter vessel which would function as a homebase.

So basically you have an idea and want someone else to make it into a mod?

Or do you want to make it yourself? In that case, you need to pick up programming in C#, and you'll need to familiarize yourself with the Unity editor (it's free). There are some subforums of subforums here in the Add-On section that are full of discussions on how to do that.

Im already building a different part of the mod in kopernicus, But i need the plugin to make it work properly. I honestly will credit whoever makes it.

Yea, modders aren't plugin writers for hire.  In almost all cases modders are people who made something "they" wanted to see in game.  If you need a plugin your best bet is to download your programming tool of choice and learn how.
